definition: rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Added support for spell checking run together words.
sentences.chinese: 增加對聯片詞校對支持。

sentences.english: The influences of the calcinations furnace's structure type on the performance of the integrated methanol catalysts are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了煅燒爐的結構型式對聯醇催化劑性能的影響。

sentences.english: Hasn't the valentine day to, what had to deliver well, delivers antithetical couplet.
sentences.chinese: 情人節到了，沒啥好送的，就送對聯一副。

sentences.english: Without the hoof shaped rhyme, Chinese antithetical couplets may not be differentiated from poetry, Ci and Qu.
sentences.chinese: 馬蹄韻使對聯與詩詞曲特別是詩的界限變得清晰。

sentences.english: Houses are decorated with red paper banners which have auspicious couplets written on them.
sentences.chinese: 人們的房子都會用對聯來裝飾。

sentences.english: Let's go see those ancient couplets.
sentences.chinese: 那我們現在就去看看那些古對聯吧。

sentences.english: He Emmanuel a move, so out of a couplet.
sentences.chinese: 他靈光一動，一副對聯就這樣出來了。

sentences.english: Couplets is a kind of Chinese traditional literary form with a long history.
sentences.chinese: 對聯是我國一種傳統的文學形式，有着悠久的歷史。

sentences.english: Lie that the face, sending a couplet.
sentences.chinese: 撒謊那個臉，送一幅對聯。

sentences.english: This antithetical couplet hanging in the library was written by Lu Hsun.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館牆上這幅字跡蒼遒的對聯，正是魯迅的手跡。

sentences.english: I asked Lao what was his favorite among all the couplets.
sentences.chinese: 我問老先生，這麼多對聯，最喜歡哪一副？

sentences.english: This antithetical couplet is my father's handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 這幅對聯是父親的親筆。

sentences.english: This pair of couplets is very famous.
sentences.chinese: 這副對聯是非常有名的。

sentences.english: Hasn't the valentine day to, what had to deliver well, delivers antithetic al couplet.
sentences.chinese: 情人節到了，沒啥好送的，就送對聯一副。

sentences.english: My mother and I sent from my friend's house couplet, ready to rise.
sentences.chinese: 我和媽媽從朋友家裏送來的對聯中，準備起來。

sentences.english: They are painted from top to bottom, right to left.
sentences.chinese: 寫對聯一般是從上到下，從右到左。

definition: couplet (hung on the columns of a hall)
Spring Festival couplet (the first line of which is pasted on the right side of a doorway at New Year, and the second on the left side)
